CHAT.comment: COEUR ALASKA, INC., Petitioner v. SOUTHEAST ALASKA CONSERVATION COUNCIL, ET AL.; and ALASKA, Petitioner v. SOUTHEAST ALASKA CONSERVATION COUNCIL, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GEN. GREGORY G. GARRE ON BEHALF OF FEDERAL RESPONDENTS, IN SUPPORT OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THEODORE B. OLSON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THOMAS S. WALDO ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF THEODORE B. OLSON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:06 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
